entry.title: Bob Ross Make Your Own Gummy Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 14.99

Create Your Own Masterpiece

Not a painter? Don't worry, this Bob Ross Make Your Own Gummy Kit will make your feel like one! This kit comes with everything you need to make beautiful and tasty gummies in 4 Fruity Flavors: Lemon, Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, and Green Apple. Make squirrels, palettes, brushes, and of course happy little trees. The kit comes complete with mold tray, colorful gummy mixes, instruction booklet and super sour powder. Continue Bob Ross' legacy by making your own delicious art candy.

Fun Fact: Bob Ross didn't want his artwork in museums. He only wanted to teach painting because he just wanted others to believe they can do it too! He wanted people to understand that anybody can make beautiful paintings like he did, with the right technique and guidance. Bob proved to us all that simply believing in yourself is key to receive excellent results. His positive beliefs & noticeable talent drew inspirations from people all around the world. Bob's joyful personality was truly contagious whether he was on or off camera, and that's why Bob is so loved up until this day.

The perfect holiday gift for artists, art-lovers, or Bob Ross fans in your life! 

Order now!

entry.title: Boston America The Office Dundie Awards Cherry Flavored Candy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 7.49

Are you a Dundie Award Winner?

A Dundie is an award bestowed annually by Dunder Mifflin Scranton regional manager Michael Scott. Fans of The Office, you can now award yourself, your friends and your family with this detailed Dundie Award. Each tin is filled with The Office logo-shaped candy in the appropriate flavour of cherry sours.

Michael Scott would be proud!

1 Tin

entry.title: The Office Stapler Gummy - 300g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 15.99

Just Another Day at Dunder Mifflin...

The Office Stapler Gummy

Novelty Candy Gift

Do it the Dunder Mifflin way with this iconic stapler encased inside of a gummy sphere. You can almost hear Dwight say "Dammit, Jim."! 

Be the Jim of The Office with this strawberry flavoured gummy inspired by his classic prank from NBC's The Office - Season 1, Episode 1: Pilot. If you've never seen it before, Dwight introduces himself and opens his drawer to show photos of his car, but instead discovers that "He put my stuff in jello again". 

Or, be the Dwight of The Office and keep this quirky item in your desk drawer - because sometimes you just want to feel like Dwight.

This would be a hilarious and harmless prank for this year's April Fools Day!

The Office lovers will LOVE this quirky edible stapler. A true must-have for those who binge watch The Office. Order today while supplies last!

10.6oz / 300g

Fresh Novelty Candy Shipped to Canada & the USA!

entry.title: Pet Surprise Farm Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 2.69

Farm Friends

Collectible Candy Toy

Pet Surprise! Toy, Candies, & Stickers!

Boston America Corp. makes the world's most creative novelty items, fun mints, and candy tins! 

This candy farmhouse is truly suitable to be here at Candy Funhouse! This is a fun candy toy that resembles a barn filled with little candies in a variety of animal shapes, plus a surprise toy animal to play with. So much fun is to be made with the addition of stickers, too! A special candy tin that provides fun times & holds delectable sweet treats within. 

Collect all 10 animals to complete the farm! 

The perfect stocking stuffer.

1 candy tin - 10g

Ingredients

Dextrose, maltodextrin, magnesium stearate, artificial flavours, arabic gum, citric acid, carnauba wax, artificial colour (FD&C yellow no.5).

entry.title: Boston America Stellina Tokidoki Unicorno
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Boston America Candy Tins

Tokidoki | The Unicornos

Stellina

Boston America Corp. makes the world's most creative novelty items, fun mints, and candy tins! Once upon a time, The Unicornos were once simple little ponies that were out trotting and suddenly wandered into a magic waterfall. Passing through the waterfall, the ponies transformed into unicorns and found a hidden magical kingdom. The Unicornos live between the magic kingdom and our world. Stellina is one of the founding Unicornos, the first Unicorno of ten in the original series 1! Her name means "Little Star". 

You will love this special candy tin that holds magical strawberry candy inside.

A perfect stocking stuffer!

1 candy tin - 1.3oz

Ingredients

Dextrose, maltodextrin, magnesium stearate, artificial flavours, arabic gum, citric acid, carnauba wax, artificial colour (FD&C yellow no.5). For nutritional information, please visit Bostonamerica.com

entry.title: Boston America Narwhal Wild Berry Sour
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 4.49

Boston America Candy Tins

Narwhal Wild Berry Sour

Boston America Corp. makes the world's most creative novelty items, fun mints, and candy tins. A strange, beautiful, and seemingly mystical creature lives year-round in the Arctic waters around Canada, Greenland, and Russia! These animals are nicknamed the "unicorn of the sea" - it's Narwhals! Some say narwhals resemble a whale and a unicorn with its body shape and a long, protruding ivory tusk. Dive into the deep blue sea with this awesome candy tin filled with wildberry sour candies. Take a trip down memory lane with this special candy tin that holds a delectable sweet treat inside. 

This would make a spectacular gift for a music lover or the nostalgic treat-hunter in your life. Makes a perfect stocking stuffer!

1 candy tin - 1.3oz

Ingredients

Dextrose, maltodextrin, citric acid, magnesium stearate, artificial flavor, artificial color (FD&C blue 1). For nutritional information, please visit Bostonamerica.com

entry.title: Bob Ross Happy Little Tree Mints
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boston America
Type: Candy
Price: 6.49

Happy Little Tree Mints

Bob Ross Happy Little Tree Mints contain 1.5 oz. of delicious little peppermint flavoured green tree mints. The perfect gift to give yourself or his PBS Happy Tree fans! 

We all remember those times when you flipped through the TV channels and found Bob Ross standing with his canvas, giving friendly art lessons to viewers. You know, that loveable artist with the curly hair that you couldn't stop watching, that's the guy we're talking about. A true legend! 

Fun Fact: Bob Ross didn't want his artwork in museums. He only wanted to teach painting because he just wanted others to believe they can do it too! He wanted people to understand that anybody can make beautiful paintings like he did, with the right technique and guidance. Bob proved to us all that simply believing in yourself is key to receive excellent results. His positive beliefs & noticeable talent drew inspirations from people all around the world. Bob's joyful personality was truly contagious whether he was on or off camera, and that's why Bob is so loved up until this day.

Bob Ross' legacy continues with these special holiday tins filled with happy trees. These happy little trees are tasty little mints, perfect for those on-the-go. Each candy tin features a heart-warming pic of a jolly Bob Ross.

The perfect holiday gift for artists, art-lovers, or Bob Ross fans in your life! 

Order now! Limited quantity.

At Candyfunhouse, we have a growing selection of holiday themed treats, snacks, gift sets/boxes, and more! Stay tuned - new stuff is added everyday! Click here to see.

3.8 x 2.4 x .8 inches
1.5 oz. of candy
